name: squad based 3d topdown
description:
You can move some elves around, get a quest, and kill some goblins. Later versions will include better models, more quests,  more refined combat, and lots of small simulation stuff for depth.  Any parts I like from kenshi but with a fantasy bent, basically.

 This one didn't have enough time for base building or npc settlements to make it in so the world might be open but it is also currently empty. I wouldn't recommend exploring.

Press shift to move the camera fast.  Arrow key or middle mouse click to rotate camera.
